mapper.select: SELECT ta01.id, ta01.title, ta01.cover, ta02.NAME as teacherName, ta04.title AS subjectLevelOne, ta03.title AS subjectLevelTwo, ta01.price, ta01.lesson_num as lessonNum FROM edu_course ta01 LEFT JOIN edu_teacher ta02 ON ta01.teacher_id = ta02.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject ta03 ON ta01.subject_id = ta03.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject ta04 ON ta01.subject_parent_id = ta04.id WHERE ta01.id = #{courseId}
